description: The northern lady fern is an amazing evergreen perennial species that adds an array of lush green to any environment. It grows fan-shaped fronds up to two feet across, composed of many small leaflets that reach out to the sky. This species is incredibly hardy across many different soils and climates, and is highly resistant to disease. Its charming arching fronds stand out in any scenery, and it can easily nuzzle up against or amongst other plants. This versatile species provides texture, depth, and color to gardens with minimal effort. The northern lady fern is a must-have for any garden!
